body_html:
@yongtang To add to @rmlarsen's command, you can pass --test_output=streamed to print out benchmark outputs.

I just tried to run the benchmarks at and before the commit in this PR and can see the regression. For e.g. BM_Xent_16_10000_gpu benchmark prints:
570.9M items/s without this change
373.9M items/s with this change

(I was running with 4 Titan X gpus, so numbers are probably different with other configs)

I just tried to run the benchmarks at and before the commit in this PR and can see the regression. For e.g. BM_Xent_16_10000_gpu benchmark prints:
570.9M items/s without this change
373.9M items/s with this change

(I was running with 4 Titan X gpus, so numbers are probably different with other configs)
